author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Grand Theft Auto 6's delay disappointed a lot of gamers, but probably disappointed retailers even more. Analysts at Ampere are suggesting that the delay will cost the games industry around $2.7 billion dollars. The money isn't gone, however, merely moved to next year when GTA 6 drops on May 26. Speaking of that date, Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick is confident that Rockstar Games can hit that date. Let's hope so—there's $2.7 billion riding on it. And finally, Nintendo will make a return to the Gamescom show in Germany this year. Nintendo skipped last year's show, but with a new console and a handful of brand new first-party games coming this year, they have plenty to show off.
title: GTA 6 Delay Will Cost Games Industry $2.7B, But Take-Two Swears It's On Schedule - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Jurassic World Rebirth in this latest teaser for the upcoming movie starring Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Bailey, Mahershala Ali, Rupert Friend, and Manuel Garcia-Rulfo. Jurassic World Rebirth opens in theaters on July 2, 2025.

Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, the planet’s ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures across land, sea and air within that tropical biosphere hold, in their DNA, the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind.

Scarlett Johansson plays skilled covert operations expert Zora Bennett, contracted to lead a skilled team on a top-secret mission to secure the genetic material. When Zora’s operation intersects with a civilian family whose boating expedition was capsized by marauding aquatic dinos, they all find themselves stranded
title: Jurassic World Rebirth - Official 'Belong' Teaser Trailer (2025) Scarlett Johansson, Mahershala Ali

author: IGN

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at the world of Chrono Odyssey in this latest trailer for the upcoming open-world action MMORPG from Chrono Studio and Kakao Games. A limited-time PC closed beta event will be available on Steam in June 2025, with sign-ups available now. Chrono Odyssey will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S.

Set in the fractured realm of Setera, Chrono Odyssey plunges players into a war against divine forces and cosmic horrors threatening all existence. As members of the Sentinel, players will wield extraordinary time-manipulation abilities to unravel mysteries spanning multiple eras—from lush medieval kingdoms to desolate post-apocalyptic wastelands.
title: Chrono Odyssey - Official CBT Announce Trailer

author: IGN
description: Lost in Starlight is coming May 30, only on Netflix! When an astronaut leaves Earth for Mars, the vast infinite space divides star-crossed lovers in this animated romance that crosses the cosmos
title: Lost in Starlight - Official Trailer (English Dub)

author: IGN
description:
Step into a gorgeous opera house with Maestro, the VR orchestra conducting rhythm game that's the essence of elegance, control, and high-society french sophistication with a classic Star Wars twist. This new DLC is fitted with the iconic Duel of the Fates from Star Wars Episode 1 and will be launching on June 20 for PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2), Meta Quest, and SteamVR.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Maestro - Official Star Wars DLC Announcement Trailer | Creature Feature Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at gameplay from Anno 117: Pax Romana, the next entry in the popular city-building strategy game series that finally brings the franchise to the peak of the Roman Empire. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3274580/Anno_117_Pax_Romana/

#Anno117PaxRomana #Gameplay #IGN
title: Anno 117: Pax Romana – Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
If you enjoyed 1800's gently gripping mix of city-planning, production-chain linking, and nautical exploration, Anno 117 delivers these fundamentals in an equally satisfying manner. But its later-game ideas, the military management and the concept of cultural assimilation, that will ultimately determine how well Anno 117 captures its Roman setting. Previewed by Rick Lane.

#Anno117PaxRomana #Gaming #IGN
title: Anno 117: Pax Romana – Anno Finally Goes to Rome and So Far It’s Glorious

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Cinematic Alpha Test Release Date Trailer for Vindictus: Defying Fate, an action-adventure RPG developed by Nexon. Players will explore a rich 3D world filled with customizable characters, detailed outfits, and a unique companion system to accompany the game's intense gameplay built on Unreal Engine 5. The upcoming Alpha Test for Vindictus: Defying Fate is packed with more characters, features, and gameplay. Vindictus: Defying Fate is coming soon to PC (Steam) with the latest Alpha Test running from June 8 through June 16 on PC (Steam).

#VindictusDefyingFate #Gaming #IGN
title: Vindictus: Defying Fate - Official Cinematic Alpha Test Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Whether you're wishing upon a star, partying under the sea, exploring a whole new world, letting it go, or feeling the love tonight, it's an accepted absolute truth that Disney films are pure magic. And that's where our list of the 25 best Disney animated movies comes in.

Beasts and beauties, ladies and tramps, princesses and frogs - Walt Disney Animation Studios has been creating sublime ground-breaking entertainment for over 100 years and its feature films, starting with 1937's Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, have cemented a cinematic legacy.
As we now rank the top 25 Disney animated films - sorry, no Pixar on this list, folks (that's a different list) - please keep in mind that this was a Herculean effort (a hint based on one of the movies on the list, perhaps?) involving the weighing of time-honored classics, new upstart arrivals, the famed '90s resurgence/revival, and our own individual favorites. It's a blending of the best and brightest that Disney has to offer.

Mirror, mirr
title: The 25 Best Disney Animated Movies of All Time

author: IGN
description:
Check out this The Last of Us show VS game comparison video! The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6 has arrived on HBO and there are a lot of similarities to be made when comparing the forth episode of TLOU TV show to the iconic TLOU2 game, developed by Naughty Dog.

Beware of spoilers ahead for The Last of Us Series! From Joel gifting Ellie a guitar, to Ellie's birthday gift flashback, and more. See how close the show's creators got to the original moments in our episode six comparison.

What did you think of this The Last of Us S2 vs The Last of Us Part 2 comparison? Let us know in the comments!

#IGN #Games #TLOU #TheLastOfUs
title: The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6: TV Show vs Game Comparison
